document_data.mainbody: '''''Dungeon'' issue 174''' was released in January of 2010 in online format only. It contained the following articles related to the [[Forgotten Realms]]:
document_data.[[Eye on the Realms]]: The Way of Lost P:
: ''By [[Ed Greenwood]], illustrated by [[Jorge Lacera]].'' '''p. 105-107'''
For centuries, wizards across the Realms have heard scores of exaggerated, sometimes entirely fanciful, tales about various lost books of spells or rituals and processes that could swiftly make them mighty in magic. {{Dusup|174/Eye on the Realms: The Way of Lost Power}}

;Books
:[[Way of Lost Power]]
